Subject: Reported Problem with Project Management Tool Crash

The project management tool has unexpectedly crashed My name is Maria Gonzalez.. It could be due to issues with device integration You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. So far, I have restarted the system and checked for available software updates.
